Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
smackdamage=26 attacks={"HelicopterSpin","ClawAttack"} rate=1/30
check=true check2=true pageused=false damage=0 lastclick=0 local debris=game:GetService("Debris")
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do a.ChildAdded:wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
waitfor(sp,"Handle")
sp.Handle.Transparency=0
function smack(hit,part) if hit~=nil then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil and h.Health>0 and check2 and damage~=0 then local chr=sp.Parent local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer local mh=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mh~=nil and mh.Health>0 and h~=mh and plr~=nil then check2=false for _,v in ipairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") tag.Name="creator" tag.Value=plr tag.Parent=h local smacksound=part:FindFirstChild("SmackSound") if smacksound~=nil then smacksound.Pitch=.75+(math.random()*.5) smacksound:Play() end h:TakeDamage(damage) wait(.2) check2=true end end end end
function makefakearms() local chr=sp.Parent local mh=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") if mh~=nil and mh.Health>0 and t then local stretchsound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("StretchSound") if stretchsound~=nil then stretchsound.Pitch=.9+(math.random()*.5) stretchsound:Play() end if flarm then flarm:remove() end if frarm then frarm:remove() end for _,v in pairs(chr:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="FakeLeftArm" or v.Name=="FakeRightArm" then v:remove() end end local larm=chr:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if larm~=nil then larm.Transparency=1 flarm=larm:Clone() flarm:ClearAllChildren() sp.Handle.SmackSound:clone().Parent=flarm flarm.FormFactor="Custom" flarm.CanCollide=false flarm.Anchored=false flarm.Transparency=0 flarm.Name="FakeLeftArm" lw=Instance.new("Weld") lw.Name="Weld" lw.Part0=larm lw.Part1=flarm lw.Parent=flarm flarm.Touched:connect(function(hit) smack(hit,flarm) end) flarm.Parent=chr end local rarm=chr:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rarm~=nil then rarm.Transparency=1 frarm=rarm:Clone() frarm:ClearAllChildren() sp.Handle.SmackSound:clone().Parent=frarm frarm.FormFactor="Custom" frarm.CanCollide=false frarm.Anchored=false frarm.Transparency=0 frarm.Name="FakeLeftArm" rw=Instance.new("Weld") rw.Name="Weld" rw.Part0=rarm rw.Part1=frarm rw.Parent=frarm frarm.Touched:connect(function(hit) smack(hit,frarm) end) frarm.Parent=chr end for _,v in pairs(chr:GetChildren()) do if v.className=="CharacterMesh" then if v.BodyPart==Enum.BodyPart.LeftArm and flarm then local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.Name="Mesh" m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(v.MeshId) --m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(v.OverlayTextureId) m.Parent=flarm elseif v.BodyPart==Enum.BodyPart.RightArm and frarm then local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.Name="Mesh" m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(v.MeshId) --m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(v.OverlayTextureId) m.Parent=frarm end end end end end
function Equipped(mouse) if mouse~=nil then mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if not pageused then pageused=true sp.CanBeDropped=false sp.Handle.Transparency=1 local fakehandle=sp.Handle:clone() local bf=Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force=Vector3.new(0,(fakehandle:GetMass()*196.2)+.5,0) bf.Parent=fakehandle fakehandle.Name="Effect" fakehandle.Transparency=0 fakehandle.CanCollide=false fakehandle.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(0,10,0) local fire=Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent=fakehandle delay(0,function() wait(1) if fakehandle~=nil then fakehandle.Transparency=1 end wait(1) if fire~=nil then fire.Enabled=false end end) debris:AddItem(fakehandle,3) fakehandle.Parent=game.Workspace makefakearms() wait(1) else lastclick=tick() print(tick()) if check then check=false wait(.2) local stretchsound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("StretchSound") if stretchsound~=nil then stretchsound.Pitch=.9+(math.random()*.5) stretchsound:Play() end --local attack=attacks[math.random(1,#attacks)] print("check",tick()-lastclick) if tick()-lastclick<.19 then attack=attacks[1] else attack=attacks[2] end local anim=sp:FindFirstChild(attack) local chr=sp.Parent local mh=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") if anim and mh and t then theanim=mh:LoadAnimation(anim) if theanim and mh.Health>0 then theanim:Play() if attack=="HelicopterSpin" then delay(0,function() local initialcf=t.CFrame local bg=Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.maxTorque=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*10^6 bg.P=10^4 bg.D=10^3 bg.cframe=initialcf bg.Parent=t rframes=2/.1 for rframe=1,rframes do local rpercent=rframe/rframes if bg~=nil then bg.cframe=initialcf*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*6*rpercent,0) end wait(.1) end if bg~=nil then bg:remove() end end) end damage=smackdamage local frames=.5/rate for frame=1,frames do local percent=frame/frames if flarm~=nil and lw~=nil then flarm.Size=Vector3.new(1,2+(percent*8),1) local m=flarm:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if m~=nil then m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1+(percent*4),1) end lw.C1=CFrame.new(0,(flarm.Size.y-2)/2,0) lw.Parent=flarm end if frarm~=nil and rw~=nil then frarm.Size=Vector3.new(1,2+(percent*8),1) local m=frarm:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if m~=nil then m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1+(percent*4),1) end rw.C1=CFrame.new(0,(frarm.Size.y-2)/2,0) rw.Parent=frarm end wait(rate) end damage=smackdamage*.618 local frames=2/rate if attack=="ClawAttack" then frames=1/rate end for frame=1,frames do local percent=1-(frame/frames) if flarm~=nil and lw~=nil then flarm.Size=Vector3.new(1,2+(percent*8),1) local m=flarm:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if m~=nil then m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1+(percent*4),1) end lw.C1=CFrame.new(0,(flarm.Size.y-2)/2,0) lw.Parent=flarm end if frarm~=nil and rw~=nil then frarm.Size=Vector3.new(1,2+(percent*8),1) local m=frarm:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if m~=nil then m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1+(percent*4),1) end rw.C1=CFrame.new(0,(frarm.Size.y-2)/2,0) rw.Parent=frarm end wait(rate) end end end damage=0 check=true end end end) end end
sp.Equipped:connect(Equipped)
